name: Canis Lupus
description:
Story Summary 

A hungry lone wolf searches through the woods to find prey, only to find out that food was scarce in the woods because of the hunters taking it all. After some more exploring, the lone wolf finds a spirit of a dead wolf who requests for the lone wolf to save his son from the hunters. The hunters have set camp somewhere, caging the captured wolf, and it's up to the lone wolf to save the son and get rid of the hunters.    

Explore a beautiful but dangerous forest

Controls

WASD - Movement

SHIFT - Sprint

SPACE - Jump

MOUSE - Camera                                                          

Q - Howl

F - Interact

X - Wolf Vision
